The banana tree is not actually a tree, it is a herb. It bears fruit once a year and then dies.

A sneeze generates a wind of 166 km/hr (100 mi/hr), and a cough moves out at 100 km/hr (60 mi/hr).
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. The second largest animal is the Afican elephant.
